
Quasar luminosity function
==========================
.. image:: ../plots/qlf.png
   :height: 200pt

Data sources
^^^^^^^^^^^^

`Kulkarni et al. 2019 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Giallongo et al. 2015 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`McGreer et al. 2013 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Yang et al. 2016 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Willott et al. 2010 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Jiang et al. 2016 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Kashikawa et al. 2015 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Glikman et al. 2011 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Giallongo et al. 2019 (subm.) <http://www.arxiv.org>`_

`Ross et al. 2013 <http://www.arxiv.org>`_
